languages.text: За каждого противника на соседних клетках в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} существо получает +5% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} и +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}.

For each enemy adjacent to it at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.
languages.original_text: За каждого противника на соседних клетках в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} существо получает +5% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} и +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}.

traits.locale_text: For each enemy adjacent to it at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains +5% critical hit chance and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

For each enemy adjacent to it at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

For each enemy adjacent to it at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に隣接している敵1匹につき、この生物は+5%のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}と+5%の{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: For each enemy adjacent to it at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に隣接している敵1体につき、この生物は5％のクリティカルヒット率と5％の{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}を得る。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，此生物周围每有一名敌人，暴击率与{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}就会提高5%。
languages.original_text: For each enemy adjacent to it at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，此生物周围每有一名敌人，暴击率与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}就会提高5%。

languages.text: Por cada enemigo adyacente al principio de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, esta criatura gana +5 % de probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} crítico y +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}.
languages.original_text: For each enemy adjacent to it at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Por cada enemigo adyacente al principio de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, esta criatura gana +5 % de probabilidad de impacto crítico y +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}.

languages.text: Für jeden zu Beginn ihres {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} angrenzenden Feind erhält diese Kreatur +5 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} und +5 % {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}.
languages.original_text: For each enemy adjacent to it at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Für jeden zu Beginn ihres {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} an sie angrenzenden Feind erhält diese Kreatur +5 % kritische Trefferchance und +5 % {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}.

languages.text: Pour chaque ennemi adjacent à sa position au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, cette créature bénéficie de +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup{/g} critique et de +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g}.
languages.original_text: For each enemy adjacent to it at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Pour chaque ennemi adjacent à sa position au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, cette créature bénéficie de +5 % de chances d'infliger un coup critique et de +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g}.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcında bitişiğinde olan her düşman için +%5 kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g} ve +%5 {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} kazanır.
languages.original_text: For each enemy adjacent to it at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

languages.text: For each enemy adjacent to it at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.
